details.callToWorship: We Have Come into His House #361
details.fellowshipSong: Are You Washed in the Blood #136
details.songOfResponse: Rock of Ages, Cleft for Me #342

list: The 4th annual Chili Cook-Off is next Sunday, February 09. Sign up to bring something in the foyer!
From Carol: We are making our last trip to Cuba to help supply our friends with medicine and money to buy pigs and chicken boxes to feed the church.
